column30: Titles: Capitalize only the first letter of the first word, e.g. Silicon Valley = Силициевата долина. Lowercase: nationalities, languages (e.g. I speak French = Аз говоря френски), months (e.g., January = януари), days of the week (Monday = понеделник). Lower case populations (All the French = Всички французи)
